column3: Generally we add keys after signing for two major releases. I see that [you've committed](https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gitian.sigs/commits?author=TheCharlatan) unsigned sigs for 0.18.1 and 0.19.0. Are you planning on producing the signed sigs as well?
Yes, I'll contribute them once the 0.19.0.0 detached sigs are up.

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA256

I have met @TheCharlatan in person and he contributed in the past to this project (first PR in mid 2018 #12971).

ACK 0ec967164f30d313e7c54879d1c6565ad75689af - confirm key A8FC55F3B04BA3146F3492E79303B33A305224CB
